title: Scientific Reasoning Assessment Tool Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific methodologies and understanding of psychometric assessment concepts
context.additional_context: Aims to develop scientific thinking assessment tools required in the Fourth Industrial Revolution era, emphasizing a convergent approach through language domain applications.

learning_goals: Systematizing evaluation criteria by analyzing multidimensional components of scientific reasoning (question formulation, hypothesis development, experimental design, etc.).
Developing a draft scientific reasoning assessment tool that meets psychometric standards (reliability, validity).
Designing and simulating an evaluative framework applicable to real educational settings through PBL team projects.

resources: Online survey creation tools (Google Forms, SurveyMonkey)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
